about_the_game:
Adds two ATLUS-themed character portraits to your party:

  • Joker from Persona 5 Royal
  • Ringo from Soul Hackers 2

These portraits can only be accessed on Etrian Odyssey HD.
detailed_description:
Adds two ATLUS-themed character portraits to your party:

  • Joker from Persona 5 Royal
  • Ringo from Soul Hackers 2

These portraits can only be accessed on Etrian Odyssey HD.

package_groups.title: Buy Etrian Odyssey HD Character Set DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X3 720
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 530, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5570, 1 GB or Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: No anti-aliasing, 720p @ 60 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB or Intel Iris Xe Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 4x AA, 1080p @ 60 FPS

short_description: Adds two ATLUS themed character portraits to your party: - Joker from Persona 5 Royal - Ringo from Soul Hackers 2 These portraits can only be accessed on Etrian Odyssey HD.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
